message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and valuable item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to consider this price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of a price that reflects its true value. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $105. Would you be willing to accept this price?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I think $115 is the lowest I can go. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still at $105. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm not willing to go any higher. Can we meet at this price?
